returns._0: true if contract is active, false if paused.

params._ethAmount: The amount of ETH to be withdrawn.

activateContract().notice: Activates the contract. Only callable by the king.

isKing(address).notice: Checks if the given address is the current king.

pauseContract().notice: Pauses the contract. Only callable by the king

withdrawETH(address,uint256).notice: Withdraws ETH. Callable Only by the King.
